organization: Cape Town MS Developer User Group
description: Join 1,875 passionate developers in Cape Town exploring Microsoft technologies, .NET, Azure, AI, and modern development practices.
mission: We are dedicated to fostering a vibrant community of developers, architects, and technology enthusiasts passionate about Microsoft technologies and modern development practices.

core_values.title: Collaboration
core_values.description: Working together to solve real-world challenges

technologies_focus.name: .NET & C#
technologies_focus.description: Modern .NET development, C# best practices, and cross-platform applications.

technologies_focus.name: Microsoft Azure
technologies_focus.description: Cloud computing, Azure services, serverless architectures, and cloud-native solutions.

technologies_focus.name: Mobile Development
technologies_focus.description: Xamarin, MAUI, cross-platform mobile apps, and mobile-first development strategies.

technologies_focus.name: Artificial Intelligence
technologies_focus.description: AI services, machine learning, cognitive services, and intelligent applications.

technologies_focus.name: DevOps
technologies_focus.description: CI/CD pipelines, Azure DevOps, automation, and modern deployment practices.

technologies_focus.name: Web Development
technologies_focus.description: ASP.NET Core, Blazor, modern web frameworks, and progressive web applications.

technologies_focus.name: IoT
technologies_focus.description: Internet of Things, edge computing, Azure IoT services, and connected devices.

technologies_focus.name: Visual Studio
technologies_focus.description: Development tools, IDE best practices, extensions, and productivity techniques.
